properties.areaDesc: Greater Lake Tahoe Area; Greater Lake Tahoe Area
properties.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued March 1 at 4:02AM PST until March 2 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Reno NV
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northeast winds 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 40 mph
expected by late afternoon. Waves 2 to 4 feet.

* WHERE...Lake Tahoe.

* WHEN...From noon today to 4 AM PST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone to
capsizing and should remain off lake waters until conditions
improve.
properties.instruction:
Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a
sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing
boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.

NWSheadline: LAKE WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 4 AM PST MONDAY FOR LAKE TAHOE
